Translations.Text: avanu (phir‌aun) helidanu; ninu drstantadondige bandiddare (hagu) ninu satyavantanagiddare adannu mundidu
avaru (musa) tam'ma urugolannu esedaru mattu hathattane adu spastavagi ondu hebbavagi bittitu
taruvaya avaru tam'ma kaiyannu horategedaru. Hathattane adu noduvavarige tumba ujvalavagi kanditu
phir‌aunana janangada saradararu helidaru; ivanu khandita obba tajna jadugaranagiddane
ivanu nim'mannu nim'ma nadininda horadabba bayasuttane. Iga nivenu adesisuttiri
avaru (phir‌aunanodane) helidaru; ivanannu hagu ivana sahodaranannu tadedittuko mattu vividha nagaragalige dutarannu kaluhisu
avaru ella tajna jadugararannu ninna balige tarali
hige, jadugararu phir‌aunana balige bandaru. Navu vijayigaladare khanditavagiyu namage pratiphala sigalide endaru
avanu (phir‌aun) helidanu; haudu, jotege nivu nanna aptara salige seruviri
avaru (jadugararu), o musa, ninu eseyuveya athava navu eseyabeke?Endu kelidaru
avaru (musa), nive eseyiri endaru. Hige avaru (jadugararu dalagalannu) esedaru, janara kannugalannu mankugolisidaru hagu avarannu hedarisibittaru mattu bhari bhavya jaduvannu mundittaru
aga navu musara kadege divyavaniyannu kalisidevu; eseyiri nim'ma urugolannu, avara ella krtaka racanegalannu adu nungibiduvudu – endu
konege, satyavu sabitagi bittitu mattu avaru (jadugararu) madiddellavu mithyavayitu
hige, avaru (phir‌aunana kadeyavaru) alle sotu hodaru mattu apamanitaragi maralidaru
avaru helidaru; navu sarvalokagala odeyanannu nambidevu
